recommended_degree: Administrasi Bisnis, Manajemen Pemasaran/Marketing, Desain Komunikasi Visual, Manajemen (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
- Responsible for managing the end to end TikTok and Instagram account from content creation, calendar planning to weekly reporting
- Be our TikTok/Instagram guru—stay on the pulse of all things of TikTok and Instagram, including trends, brand’s conversation, popular creators, & competitor monitoring
- Be self-sufficient and agile with producing your own content, leveraging on the current trends while also adhering to the brand guideline
- Understand deadlines and schedules in order to help prioritize products in a high-volume environment
